course_description: Learn to balance on your bike while stationary. Progress from basic holds to hands-free trackstands for commuters and track cyclists.
Get comfortable on a road bike with proper fitting, group riding etiquette, and basic maintenance skills.
Master the freestyle stroke with proper breathing, body rotation, and kick technique. Includes drills for each component.
From holding the guitar to playing your first songs. Covers chords, strumming patterns, and fingerpicking basics.
Build your first websites from scratch. Learn semantic HTML, responsive CSS, and interactive JavaScript step by step.

course_title: Building Full Stack Apps with JHipster
course_description: Learn to build production-ready full stack applications with JHipster 8. Based on the Electronic Armory tutorial series by Mike Ziray. Covers microservices architecture, Angular frontend, Spring Boot API, Consul service discovery, Docker, and Liquibase migrations. Learn With Hamster is a real-world example built from this exact blueprint.
